sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Remove mandatory attribute from source_element_id field on sys_ux_addon_event_mapping dictionary</description>
        <name>Made source element non-mandatory - AOEM</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var glideRecord = new GlideRecord("sys_dictionary");
if (glideRecord.isValid()) {
    glideRecord.setWorkflow(false);
    glideRecord.setUseEngines(false);
    glideRecord.addQuery("name", "sys_ux_addon_event_mapping");
    glideRecord.addQuery("element", "source_element_id");
    glideRecord.query();
    if (glideRecord.next()) {
        glideRecord.setValue("mandatory", "false");
        glideRecord.update();
    }
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2022-03-22 15:41:25</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>c9799347ff1201101cb3ff4e253bf1bb</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Made source element non-mandatory - AOEM</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="UX Framework" source="com.glide.uxbuilder">68e6b4e43cb1311068bcf327dfe37f56</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_c9799347ff1201101cb3ff4e253bf1bb</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2022-03-22 15:41:25</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
